title: The Hard core
creator_credit: International Refugee Organization. Office of Public Information and Arthur Zegart
brief_description: Film deals with the “hard core” on intellectuals and invalid war victims remaining in the displaced persons’ camps in Europe and shows the steps already taken by the International Refugee Organisation to alleviate the suffering of these special groups and try to find homes for them in other countries.
